attributes.action: Increase the single person occupancy council tax rebate to 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Single people work hard and I believe get neglected from Government.  We don't have someone to support us financially.  Council tax is one of our largest bills after rent/mortgage.  I believe that 25% discount is not enough and would like to see the Government, when it is reviewing its taxation policy, increase the single occupancy rebate to 50% and help the hard working single people within the UK!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
